segments.text: Nine ... but I'll be ten on May 1st.When is your birthday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm older than you ! I'll be ten on April 14th .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you going to have a birthday party ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe . I'll have to ask my mother .
segments.speaker: S1
